content.question: The excerpt could best be used by historians studying which of the following?

choices.label: The development of new transportation technologies
The emergence of nativist political parties
The relocation of Native Americans from the South
The growth of the abolition movement in the United States

content.answer: The growth of the abolition movement in the United States

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
